sentence.Network_en: He just gazed at me slack-jawed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他张大了嘴巴，吃惊地盯着我。

sentence.Network_en: I've been thinking I'd better have asked for a lantern.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一直认为我还不如要一个灯笼呢.

sentence.Network_en: There is an ice lantern show in Harbin every year in winter.
sentence.Network_cn: 每年冬天,哈尔滨有一次冰灯展.
